header.subtitleSm: Take this FREE quick test to know!

dependents.label: Does someone financially depend on you other than yourself? *

monthlySupport.label: How much of your monthly income goes to your dependents? *

supportDuration.label: For how long will your dependents still need your financial support? *

step2.question: When a serious illness costing P1,000,000 strikes today, where do you plan to get money to pay for it? *

insurancePreference.label: Do you prefer having your personal insurance cover everything when this situation arises? *
insurancePreference.option1: Yes, I want a peace of mind
insurancePreference.option2: I'm okay with my options above

savingsSufficiency.label: When you become unfit to work due to illness or disability, can your savings now support your lifestyle today? *
savingsSufficiency.option1: Yes, it will last me at least 6 months
savingsSufficiency.option2: Yes, my savings is up to 1 year of my expenses
savingsSufficiency.option3: No, I need help from others

monthlyExpenses.label: How much is your current lifestyle? (approximate monthly expenses) *

activePlan.label: Any existing insurance plan that is still active? *
activePlan.placeholder: i.e. Prulife Prulink Assurance Account, Sunlife Maxilink

benefits.label: What are the benefits you have from your existing Plan? *
benefits.option5: Not Applicable (I don't have existing Plan)

resultDelivery.label: You're done! Where do you want to receive your result?
